inclusion.criterion: severe obstetric hemorrhage of any cause
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: obstetric hemorrhage patients derived from other hospitals
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: estimated blood loss of less than 1000 ml
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients who do not want to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. Lab results show hemoglobin: 9.7 g/dL, platelet: 110,000 /cu.mm, creatinine: 3.6 mg/dL, BUN: 73 mg/dL, direct bilirubin: 2.4 mg/dL, LDH: 881 IU/L.
